name: EliTechWiz-V4
description: Advanced WhatsApp Bot with Multi-Platform Deployment Support

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for bot commands

SESSION_ID.description: Your session ID (the code you receive after scanning QR code)

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set to 'yes' for public mode or 'no' for private mode

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name as the bot owner

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your WhatsApp number without '+' (include country code)

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Image URLs for your bot menu (comma-separated)

PM_PERMIT.description: Prevent users from using bot in private messages ('yes' to enable)

ANTILINK_GROUP.description: Auto-delete links and remove senders ('yes' to enable)

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Automatically read contact statuses ('yes' to enable)

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Automatically react to contact statuses ('yes' to enable)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Automatically download and send contact statuses ('yes' to enable)

AUTO_BIO.description: Automatically update bot bio with time ('yes' to enable)

WARN_COUNT.description: Maximum warnings before action is taken

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Forward deleted messages to your inbox ('yes' to enable)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI features
